title: DJ Sona Skin Bugged
body: The DJ Sona skin will change color with each ability but the design stays the same. So no swapping back and forth between all those cool DJ setups

replies.body:
Hey Izazal01! 

Are you using ctrl + 5 or /toggle to change stances? Doing so will swap you through all three styles.
It's not bugged for me. I can view all 3 forms on my end.
